meanings.definition: Aromatic hydrocarbons containing one or more benzene rings.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied different arenes in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Arenes are often found in gasoline and other fuels.
meanings.sent3: The arenes in the chemical reaction were quite aromatic.
meanings.sent4: Her perfume smelled like a bouquet of arenes.
meanings.sent5: The arenes in the air gave the room a sweet smell.

meanings.definition: Arene compounds are commonly used in the production of plastics and pharmaceuticals.
meanings.sent1: The factory produced arenes for making new plastic products.
meanings.sent2: Arene compounds play a crucial role in the pharmaceutical industry.
meanings.sent3: The arenes in the lab were working hard to create new medicines.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a factory of ideas, churning out arenes of innovation.
meanings.sent5: The arenes in the production line moved swiftly, ready to be transformed into useful materials.
